title: Blood Moon Jhin

embed.description: Here is a fan art skin I did for the LoL character Jhin for fun. (Khada Jhin is of course property of Riot Games and from League of Legends)

body:
Been a huge fan of Jhin since his announcement and decided do some fanart based on the Blood Moon skin line. 

I have some breakdown concepts in the link :D

I hope you guys enjoy my Fan art!

replies.body: Jesus christ dude this looks better than a lot of official skin concepts, Riot should hire you.
He said he isn't the creator of the art, he stated that he found that art when he just looked at fan arts.
no this is my art, I am the creator. poor wording on my part
Not fan of jhin but that looks pretty good

why do you not have riot in front of your name if you work for riot? :o
also its awesome... i dont get much for jhin or blood moon skins (dirty project yi main) but your skills in art force me to have an interest in it.
(also if you could show a video of how you do your art that be pretty cool... im in college doing an art and design course in the UK atm)
I don't work for Riot, this is just some fan art I made. I'm just an artist who loves to play their games :D

THEN WHY IS IT SO AMAZING!?!??!?!
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Dude just a side note. CRITAMA. THE CRIT CLASS HERO. ONE CRIT MAN WE WORSHIP YOU. I OFFER MY CRIT CHANCE TO YOU.

your not the first but that comment is quite a bit rarier then the people who just go "one punch man" or "saitama" its like http://i.memeful.com/media/post/Wdnk3zw_700w_0.jpg what the fuck am i meant to say now without sounding like a dick... "grats you watch a good anime?" xD
\*----* This is amazing. I need dis.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=HN8ljhHr,comment-id=0033,timestamp=2016-05-10T19:08:11.228+0000)
>
> \*----* This is amazing. I need dis.

SO MAKE IT HAPPEN!
IT IS HAPPENING!!!!!!
Well you just might be in a position to get the ball rolling. Perks of working in game development, eh?
thanks! I'm glad you enjoy it :D {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Looks great, and the detail you brought to the whole design is awesome. Riot really should hire you.
Riot PLEASE

I am a Jhin main and I think this would be fabulous in-game. If riot looks at this, they might add this skin and even hire you!
{{champion:202}} needs a new skin anyways, so I have high hopes for this!
tbh, i really dont like High noon jhin, if they add this im gonna buy it immediately!
I really dislike the Blood Moon skinline (bad looking particles IMO) but the artwork you've done is phenomenal.
As someone with 180k Mastery Points on {{champion:202}} I need this skin. Well done!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

Today someone in the Memes/Games board linked this in a conversation. 

I never thought that something really great would be found in the Memes/Games board.

Either way this is fucking amazing and Riot needs to add this into the game.

As a hardcore Jhin enthusiast myself I'm so happy and amazed you made this very cool skin concept! I really, really love how you did his cloak with the red beltlike thing laced in. I really love the armor part too, it's very stylish.
Might I make a few suggestions concerning his mask? It would look even more amazing it was more scary. More smiling scary, with teeth, frowning. I'm thinking about Kalista's mask, but less gleeful maybe. Also MOAR horns, 4 to be exact. There's a place for them on his glorious forehead. Long horns, perhaps with the swirling pattern coming back in them as on his armor. Heck, maybe even qilin antlers???? Haven't seen those on Bloodmoon skins! Qilin are said to appear with the imminent arrival or passing of a sage or illustrious ruler. Well, Jhin kills these important persons. How ironic!
Ahhhh anyway sorry for the rambling I just want a proper skin for him, he'd deserve it so much, and I really like this concept. I hope I didn't come off as an offensive know-it-all or anything! I'm very passionate about this spooky mentally ill Bob Ross.

Continue being awesome my dear! {{champion:202}}
The Devil takes your soul in the name of beauty. #Confirmedvoiceline

Riot, if you don't hire this guy- i'm going to ... **riot**.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

The only thing that needs to be tweaked is his gun. Would be badass if it had some type of red aura and red souls hovering/orbiting/whizzing around it. Would be awesome if aa animation would show like a red soul or something whizzing through the air...
Laken nice to see you here , great work as always , I wish this was ingame so bad ...
I don't even play Jhin and I want that skin.
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}} this is a great fanart I applaud you sir
WHOA this is amazing! This needs to happen...

Yes please!

You have my up vote, and my comment :^)
Thank you so much :D

Congratulations on your skin idea actually becoming a skin in game! I was honestly looking for special interactions for the skin and this thread popped up, ive been a Jhin main for a while and haven't seen this yet.
Thank you so much man! Was really excited when I saw it got announced!

Is it happening? ;)

https://scontent.fapa1-1.fna.fbcdn.net/v/t1.0-9/16174654_1031599423612803_2921781444850727479_n.jpg?oh=320c2f46fb3bf7befe1bb1b3a2fc65d4&oe=590E312B

Blood in the heavens. Blood on the floor.

I'll be honest, I would be VERY surprised if it looked anything like mine! I'm sure Riot's will knock it out of the ballpark! 

I;m HYPED REGARDLESS!

Well we never know, I mean, someone came up with a Pool Party MF not long before she was real and it looked really similar.  So since this has been around for a bit longer than that, it's possible it could have similarities.

https://twitter.com/LeagueOfLegends/status/822525464891691008 

It is happening. He is here.
I'll be honest. I would be VERY surprised if it looked anything like mine! I'm sure Riot's will knock it out of the ballpark!
WOW RITO PLEASE!!! I need this Skin :)

i like the concept a lot (blood moon is most def my favorite skin theme) but i think theres too much white, it looks to much like his base skin, especially considering you will be seeing it most of the time from a top pov, maybe change the color to something else like a darker grey or black even.

or hell try gold, in lore before he was put in jail he was known as the "golden demon" so that'd be pretty cool.

else wise really cool concept, a lot of the blood moon skins are based off of kabuki, which would mesh well with jhin's thespian themes
Wait, why isn't Riot hiring you?
its perfect
Honestly that is amazing artwork, I really hope someone from Riot will look at it! It would be a GREAT skin and I'd buy it! You did an awesome job man!
I WOULD BUY THAT IN A HEART BEAT
